name: Generation Thrive
description: Free meeting and event spaces for Bay Area-based nonprofits including conference rooms, coworking space, A/V equipment, and printing; priority for Warriors and Kaiser grantees
fullDescription: Generation Thrive, a partnership between the Golden State Warriors and Kaiser Permanente, provides free meeting and workspace to Bay Area nonprofits at their state-of-the-art facility.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free conference rooms
- Coworking space available
- Full A/V equipment included
- Printing services
- Professional meeting environment
- Priority for Warriors/Kaiser grantees
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Bay Area-based nonprofit
2. Submit space request online
3. Describe your organization and needs
4. Warriors/Kaiser grantees receive priority
5. Wait for confirmation of availability
6. Follow facility guidelines for use
keywords: Generation Thrive, Warriors, Kaiser, free meeting space, nonprofit venue, conference room, coworking, event space
